column5: I went to Buffalo Lake this morning to try pan fishing.  Never did this before.  GREAT FUN    I personally caught 32 assorted fish in 2 hours.   Mostly crappie-largest 10"==couple of sunnies---couple of rock bass. Used small jigs with foodsource  magots, & pencil bobbers. I will be definately doin this agin.   GREAT FUN     None were kept for the pan.  This way I can get these same guys next time.
good job,  i agree that pan fish can be a great way to spend an afternoon, usually pretty easy to catch and alot of fun to boot.   jason
